dataRoles.description: Data role used to identify and/or label the data points on X-axis.
dataRoles.name: x

dataRoles.description: Output quantity, error count, lead time, or process value to be investigated.
dataRoles.name: measuredValue

dataRoles.description: Data role to identify single point.
dataRoles.name: uniqueID

dataRoles.description: Data role to mark change point in process to recalculate the limits, and to mark variable size of subgroup (S&R-chart).
dataRoles.name: subgroup

dataRoles.description: Identify datapoints belonging to a facet (small multiple).
dataRoles.name: facet

dataRoles.description: Data roles to be shown as tooltips.
dataRoles.name: tooltip

dataRoles.description: Link to open by clicking a data point.
dataRoles.name: link

dataRoles.description: Area of Opportunity for p-, and u-charts.
dataRoles.name: aoo

dataRoles.description: User specified value for Upper Control Line.
dataRoles.name: customUCL

dataRoles.description: User specified value for Center Line.
dataRoles.name: customCL

dataRoles.description: User specified value for Lower Control Line.
dataRoles.name: customLCL

dataRoles.description: User specified value for Upper Control Line of variance.
dataRoles.name: customUCLvar

dataRoles.description: User specified value for Lower Control Line of variance.
dataRoles.name: customLCLvar

Licensing.description: Enable licensed features and enter a license key.

Chart.description: Select chart type and chart specific properties. Requires a valid license.

dynamicSubgroupSize.description: Enable / disable dynamic subgroup size. Dynamic size requires data role 'step / subgroup' to be set.

subgroupSize.description: Enter the size of a subgroup (1-n).

aooSize.description: Enter the size of Area of Opportunity (1-n).

ewma_initial_n.description: Initial value for EWMA is calculated from n first observation. This determines the group size (n).

facet_rows.description: Number of rows or columns facets should have.

facet_label_size.description: Size of facet lable in points (1-n).

commonY.description: Same axis for all facets' Y-axis (enabled) or each facet has own axis (disable).

custom_y_axis_max.description: Set manually Y-axis scale maximum value.

custom_y_axis_min.description: Set manually Y-axis scale minimum value.

Control_lines.description: Enable / disable control lines and control their behavior.

force_lcl_to_zero.description: Prevent negative LCL values. If LCL zero or positive, does not have effect.

Custom_limits.description: Enable / disable use of user specified control limits and control their behavior.

show.description: Enable / disable use of user specified control lines.

custom_limit_type.description: Select where values are specified. In settings (static) or in data (dynamic).

Run_tests.description: Enable / disable run tests and control their behavior.

run_test_1.displayName: * Run test 1 (value over UCL or under LCL) *
run_test_1.description: Single value over UCL or under LCL.

run_test_1_color_over.description: Color for failed run test 1 values over the limit.

run_test_1_color_under.description: Color for failed run test 1 value under the limit.

run_test_2.displayName: * Run test 2 (n values over or under CL) *
run_test_2.description: X consecutive values over or under average (CL).

run_test_2_color_over.description: Color for failed run test 2 values over the limit.

run_test_2_color_under.description: Color for failed run test 2 values under the limit.

run_test_2_x.description: How many many consecutive values are considered as an error (1-n).

run_test_3.description: X consecutive values increasing or decrasing.

run_test_3_color_over.description: Color for failed run test 3 values increasing.

run_test_3_color_under.description: Color for failed run test 3 values decreasing.

run_test_3_x.description: How many many consecutive values are considered as sn error (1-n).

run_test_5.description: 2 our of 3 values over or under 2-sigma line.

run_test_5_color_over.description: Color for failed run test 5 values over the limit.

run_test_5_color_under.description: Color for failed run test 5 values under the limit.

run_test_6.description: 4 our of 5 values over or under 1-sigma line.

run_test_6_color_over.description: Color for failed run test 6 values over the limit.

run_test_6_color_under.description: Color for failed run test 6 values under the limit.

rtfIndicator.description: Select the appearance of failed run test indicator.

Appearance.description: Control general look and fool of the visual.

bgColor.description: Select the color the chart background.

pointSize.description: Size of the data point circle.

xLabel.description: Enter custom text for x-axis label.

xLabelSize.description: Size of the text in x-axis label in points (0-n).

yLabel.description: Enter custom text for y-axis label.

yLabelSize.description: Size of the text in y-axis label in points (0-n).

x_axis_tick_size.description: Size of the text in x-axis tick label in points (0-n).

rotate_x_axis.description: Enable / disable x-axis tick label rotation.

y_axis_tick_size.description: Size of the text in y-axis tick label in points (0-n).

cll_decimal_count.description: How many decimal places (control) line labels show (0-15).

drawing_mode.description: Select draw mode: static = all shown at once, dynamic = visuals is drawn gradually.
